pullrequest.title: Logging Part 8: Ignition tools `ign log` command

content.raw:
That's a really really good point that I hadn't considered.

All the messages that are to be published are retrieved during `Start()`, so you're right: none of the additional topics that you add after `Start()` will get published.

This makes me think that the "right" way to do things is `Start()` should return a `PlaybackHandlePtr` object which only provides the functions `Stop()` and `WaitUntilFinished()`. Those member functions would be removed entirely from the `Playback` class.

It would involve a little bit of refactoring, but I don't think it would take long. It would make our API and implementation much more airtight.
